# Problem 3: Largest Prime Factor
```{r p-3}
library(gmp)
factors <- factorize(600851475143)
```

# Problem 2: Even Fibonacci Numbers
```{r p-2}
fib <- c(1, 1)

while (sum(tail(fib, n = 2)) < 4000000) {
  fib <- c(fib, sum(tail(fib, n = 2)))
}

sum <- 0

for (n in fib) {
  if(n %% 2 == 0){
    sum <- sum + n
  }
  sum
}

print(sum)
```

# Problem 1: Multiples of 3 and 5
```{r p-1}
m = 0

for (n in 1:999){
  if(n %% 3 == 0 | n %% 5 == 0){
    m = m + n
  }
}

print(m)
```
